about_the_game:
The Demon King has fallen! Devour your rivals and evolve into a powerful demon, battle your way to the crown and bring fire and terror down on the hellish world around you.

Release your inner fire in Demon King.

A new King is rising in the underworld, one demon must rise to take the place of the old king, and many will fall to pave the way. You must consume your enemies to grow in strength and become powerful enough to take and hold your rightful crown of power. Leap into fiery battles, and unleash hell on your foes.

EVOLVE

Choose between three demonic evolution trees, and switch between them at will to suit your play styles. Which will you master?

DEVOUR

Defeating your opponents is not enough, devour your kill to take their essence and feed your own.

BETRAY

Work together to take down the Demon King, then take the crown for yourself, call upon the fires of hell to annihilate anyone who dares to oppose you.


Are you strong enough to become the new king of hell?

  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6400 CPU @ 2.70GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 640/Radeon R7 GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Demon King is a multiplayer king-of-the-hill game where you become a powerful demon. Devour other demons to grow, evolve and become the King of hell.
